data.text: Houru chuny joga, hogiuru,
Wuouru gi muolo ne Jerusalem,
Ngʼat moro kok niya:
Holo ka holo nobugi mapongʼ,
Eka duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye nofwenyre
Dwol moro wacho niya, “Tingʼ dwondi iywagi.”
Lum ner kendo maua tuo mi lwar piny
Lum ner kendo maua tuo mi lwar piny,
In mikelo wach maber ne Sayun,
Neuru, Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto biro gi teko,
Orito rombene mana kaka jakwath:
En ngʼa mosepimo pi e chuny lwete
En ngʼa mosefwenyo pach Jehova Nyasaye,
En ngʼa mane Jehova Nyasaye openjo mondo opuonje,
Adier ogendini chalo mana ka pi matin modongʼ e dapi;
Yiende mag Lebanon ok oromo moko mach mar kendo mar misango,
Ogendini duto ok gimoro e nyime,
En ngʼa ma dipim gi Nyasaye?
To nyiseche manono, jatheth nyalo loso
Ngʼat modhier ma ok nyal golo chiwo machalo kama,
Donge ungʼeyo
Nyasaye obet e kom duongʼne kuma bor moyombo piny
Odwoko ruodhi piny
Ka okudhogi gi muche to giner
Nyasaye Maler penjo niya, “En ngʼa madupima-go?
Tingʼuru wengeu malo kendo ungʼi polo:
Yaye joka Jakobo angʼo momiyo uwuoyo,
Donge ungʼeyo?
Omiyo joma ool teko
Jomatindo nyalo bedo mool mi nyosre,
to joma oketo genogi kuom Jehova Nyasaye
